headline: Rape and Relationship: A Weinstein Accuser’s Complicated Testimony
abstract: Jessica Mann told a jury that Harvey Weinstein blocked her from leaving a room and forced her to undress: “I was very angry inside and very scared.”
lead_paragraph: Jessica Mann met the film producer Harvey Weinstein at a party after she had moved to Los Angeles from a dairy farm in Washington State to pursue acting. The Hollywood mogul seemed to take an immediate interest in her career.
